name: Bird Bounce (4mole)
description:
Description

You are a bird constantly flying through the sky and are forbidden to land back on the ground. During your journey, other birds fly above you and drop some of the worms that they carry to their nest. Your goal is to stay in the sky as long as you can by eating worms and spending coins on upgrades in the upgrade shop. Have fun!

Controls Spacebar - Flap Mouse - left click with the mouse in the shop to purchase upgrades.Support Me With Crypto

My BTC Address ->       bc1qtnft5j4snv78p3ct67myrrsvf5yud3qqprpwnf
